member.name: T:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior
member.summary: Provides attached properties that display animated GIFs in a standard Image control.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.GetAnimatedSource(System.Windows.Controls.Image)
member.summary: Gets the value of the AnimatedSource attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element from which to read the property value.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.SetAnimatedSource(System.Windows.Controls.Image,System.Windows.Media.ImageSource)
member.summary: Sets the value of the AnimatedSource attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element on which to set the property value.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.GetRepeatBehavior(System.Windows.Controls.Image)
member.summary: Gets the value of the RepeatBehavior attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element from which to read the property value.
member.returns: The repeat behavior of the animated image.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.SetRepeatBehavior(System.Windows.Controls.Image,System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior)
member.summary: Sets the value of the RepeatBehavior attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element on which to set the property value.
The repeat behavior of the animated image.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.GetAnimateInDesignMode(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the value of the AnimateInDesignMode attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element from which to read the property value.
member.returns: true if GIF animations are shown in design mode; false otherwise.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.SetAnimateInDesignMode(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the value of the AnimateInDesignMode attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element on which to set the property value.
true to show GIF animations in design mode; false otherwise.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.AddAnimationCompletedHandler(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.RoutedEventHandler)
member.summary: Adds a handler for the AnimationCompleted attached event.
member.param: The UIElement that listens to this event.
The event handler to be added.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.RemoveAnimationCompletedHandler(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.RoutedEventHandler)
member.summary: Removes a handler for the AnimationCompleted attached event.
member.param: The UIElement that listens to this event.
The event handler to be removed.
